publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1954.1 David Stewart: Wildlife Crimeâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1954) in the name of Frank Mulholland, insert at end "supports in full the recommendations of the Tomkins report, and calls on the Scottish Government to produce an action plan on tackling wildlife crime, including a timetable for the implementation of the report. Supported by: Sarah Boyack*
